name: MAGIC DICES
description:
Roll your magic dices to defeat your enemies !! CONTROLS :

- Hold Right click to move

- Hold Space to roll the dice, and release to shoot the nearest enemy

This little game was made for GMTK jam 2022, the theme was "Roll the Dice"

I had the idea of the game before the beginning of the jam, so when I saw the theme I had to participate !

I made the character before the jam, and I did't made the confetti FX  !

I want to make a post jam version of this, it will be a rogue lite where your drop faces on enemies and craft your dice
